LanguageData.GommageAnxiety.stages.inquiet_du_Gommage: I've heard about this mysterious phenomenon... What if my age is the next to be cursed?
LanguageData.GommageAnxiety.stages.terrifi_par_le_Gom: My age is approaching dangerous numbers! I could disappear at any moment!
LanguageData.GommageAnxiety.stages.panique_du_Gommage: This is a cursed age! I'm going to be erased! I have to do something!
LanguageData.ExpeditionMissionReady.stages.prt_pour_l: We have an operational headquarters. I feel ready to face The Gommage!
LanguageData.MemorialRespect.stages.respect_les_gomms: I paid tribute to those who were erased. Their sacrifice will not be forgotten.
LanguageData.ExpeditionCamaraderie.stages.camaraderie: I shared expedition stories with my companions. We are united against the Gommage.
LanguageData.SurvivedGommage.stages.survcu_au_Gommage: We survived a Gommage! Maybe we can really defeat The Painter.
LanguageData.LostToGommage.stages.perdu_dans_le_Gomma: Someone was erased... They simply disappeared, as if they had never existed.
